answers.answer: Tylenol is the oy thing safe to take while pregnant according to my docs. They have a Tylenol cold medicine as well. I've had to take both since being pregnant.
If Tylenol does  not resolve your headache or you also experience blurred vision or epigastric pain call your doctor you could have preeclampsia.
My doc gave me a list of safe meds while pregnant, Benadryl is safe.
Amoxicillin works too I'm taking it right now cause I'm sick.
I suffer with bad headaches never had so many until become preg worst one I had was 4days :( I know the feeling x

I took the Tylenol and couldn't keep it down :/ my mom is worried because she thinks it could be a sign of high blood pressure. I called my doctor and they are closed for the holiday. It still hasn't gone away. This is my first time experiencing a head ache this bad. Should I go in to make sure or do yal think this is just normal??

question: I am 37 weeks and 4 days and a ftm. I woke up around 6 a.m this morning with the WORST head ache, and it still hasn't gone away. Idk what to do or what to take. It hurts so bad. I also have a runny nose. Anyone have any suggestions please let me know. I am about to cry because it hurts so bad :(
title: please help :/
